original_title: Hangover Revenge of The Desperate Women
overview: Four modern women: Alice (America goddess), Lisa (Office Lady), Liyuan (beautiful housewife), Wenwen (hate married women Cock wire) to withstand the pressure of urban life, the feelings do not go well, everyone has their own depression, four due to heavy drinker and leads to some hilarious story of the encounter.
tagline: Chinese female version of The Hangover
title: Hangover Revenge of The Desperate Women
